name: Webssh
tagline: WebSSH is a simple web project which support login linux server with explorer.
body:
webssh ==================== WebSSH is a simple web project which support login linux server with explorer. License: `MIT` (see LICENSE) Information ----------- > 1.git clone https://github.com/xsank/webssh.git > 2.pip install paramiko && pip install tornado > 3.python main.py > 4.open your explorer and input your data then connect,the server init port is `9527`, > you can modify it in `webssh.conf` file Preview -------
Others ------ Now the webssh support `linux` `mac` and `windows` OS. Please let me know if you meet any other problems. Email:xsank@foxmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
